charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] headed to the seaside
to explore and found Raihan and Marlon having a
Pokémon battle.
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_1201_0200:
Dude! You rocked out even here by the sea!
You’re strong fo’ reals!
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_1201_0300:
You’re not too bad yourself! We definitely need to
do this again sometime!
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_1201_0400:
All right. I gotta make sure to wipe you down
real good. We don’t want you getting all rusty
from the sea breeze.
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_1201_0500:
There we go! All clean! Time for a selfie to
commemorate this!
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_0401_0700:
What?! Oh, it’s just you. Don’t scare me like
that, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_0402_0900:
What?! Oh, it’s just you. Don’t scare me like
that, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_1201_1000:
That scare made my picture all blurry. Shame.
And I’d just gotten Duraludon all clean and
shiny, too!
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_0401_1200:
Yeah. I’ve got to wipe him down really good or
else his body will get rusty.
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_0302_1300: You sure are kind to your Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_0402_1400:
Yeah. I’ve got to wipe him down really good or
else his body will get rusty.
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_1201_1600:
Their metal bodies rust easily, so they’re not very
good around water or sea breezes.
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_0301_1700: So why are you training by the sea?
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_0401_1800:
I’ve gotta be ready to battle in any environment.
Where better to train than at a place where I’m at
a disadvantage?
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_0302_1900: And you picked this training spot?
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_0402_2000:
Yeah! I’ve gotta be ready to battle in any
environment! That’s why this is such
good training!
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_1201_2100:
Duraludon’s metal body is tough but lightweight,
so he’s able to move about quickly.
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_1201_2200:
If I can learn to make proper use of Duraludon’s
abilities on uneven terrain while a sea breeze is
blowing, I’ll be unstoppable!
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_1201_2300:
You’ve got to help your partner overcome its
weaknesses while working on its strengths. That’ll
give you more options in battle, you know?
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_0401_2500:
To tell you the truth, I once lost a battle to an
opponent who had a terrain advantage...
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_0402_2700:
Is it? To tell you the truth, I once lost a battle to
an opponent who had a terrain advantage.
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_1201_2800:
That was a really painful defeat. But I don’t want
to make the environment an excuse for any battle
I lose.
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_1201_2900:
I’m sure Duraludon is excited for this training
and eager to get stronger—just like I am!
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_1201_3000:
But why am I talking so much? While I’ve got you
here, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_1201_3100: Why don’t we train together a bit?
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_0401_3300: Great! But first, let’s snag a sweet selfie together!
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_0402_3500:
Of course! But first, let’s snag a sweet
selfie together!
charaepi_ch0257_00_qibana/2301_1201_3600:
I can’t wait to see what your face looks like after
we’re done training!
